name: Laserfocus
headline: Implement streamlined Salesforce processes for agile GTM teams
description:
Laserfocus makes your sales process as simple as possible, but not simpler:

- Maximizes the time salespeople can spend on selling by showing them what they need to focus on
- Ensures that all data lands into Salesforce in the proper fields so you can make informed business decisions

# Make Salesforce easy to use
Laserfocus makes your Salesforce process as simple as possible, but not simpler. Made for data-driven GTM teams who don't want to sacrifice efficiency. 
[Sign up for free→→](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/app.laserfocus.io/signup>)
No Credit Card needed.
[![Laserfocus - Beautiful UX for Salesforce users | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=351212&theme=light)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/laserfocus?utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-laserfocus>)
## Beautiful, fast, simple to use
Organize your tasks, emails, events, notes, and Salesforce updates within one interface. Reduce jumping between different tabs and tools to increase your efficiency and focus.
![Quick Demo of Laserfocus](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
[Try for free→→](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/app.laserfocus.io/signup>)
[![Wallbox logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/wallbox-logo.53c205a8.svg)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/wallbox.com>)
[![Upflow logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/upflow-logo.6b23a66b.svg)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/upflow.io>)
[![Choco logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/choco-logo.19021cae.svg)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/choco.com>)
[![Harness Giving logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/harness-logo.375800ec.svg)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/harnessgiving.com>)

[![Personio logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/personio-logo.4e961939.svg)](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/personio.com>)
![Stack cards](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
## Simple guidelines for each stage
Laserfocus will guide you on what to focus on at each stage.
You will never forget any step; nothing slips through the cracks again.
![VAI logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/vai-logo.261031e7.svg)
“My team increased productivity by 25% - more calls, more deals.”
![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
Philip
VP Sales from Vai Trade
![Marbles sliding down a fast slide while others take a longer path in the background](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
## Make your Salesforce clean and usable again
Eliminate duplicate fields and ambiguous data for consistency.
Your team will enjoy a streamlined interface while Salesforce runs the workflows behind the scene.
![Personio logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/personio-logo.4e961939.svg)
“I am in love. My pipe is up to date for the first time.”
![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
Gregor
Account Executive from Personio
![Pipeline table](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
## Stay agile for your GTM
Your business requirements and processes might change often.
Laserfocus ensures that everyone adapts to your new process by guiding everyone through the latest changes.
![Choco logo](https://www.laserfocus.io/_next/static/media/choco-logo.19021cae.svg)
“I started using it and now all the other departments are on Laserfocus, too.”
![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
Anthony
Operations at Choco
## Your Salesforce data stays with you
Our precache technology only loads your Salesforce data onto your local machine. Therefore we don't need to store your Salesforce data which enables the highest security for any Enterprise.
[See our security measures here→→](https://www.laserfocus.io/<https:/security.laserfocus.io>)
Enterprise ready security
  * ![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
**Salesforce Oauth** SSO
  * ![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
**GDPR** Compliant
  * ![](https://www.laserfocus.io/)
**CCPA** Compliant

generated_description:
**Laserfocus** is a Berlin-based startup that launched in 2019 and was part of Y Combinator's W20 cohort. Their mission is to simplify Salesforce processes for agile go-to-market (GTM) teams—essentially helping salespeople maximize their selling time by focusing on what’s important and ensuring all their data lands properly in Salesforce.

The philosophy that drives Laserfocus can be encapsulated in their mantra: “make your sales process as simple as possible, but not simpler.” They address the common pain points in sales operations by centralizing various tasks (emails, events, notes, and Salesforce updates) into a single intuitive interface, effectively reducing the need to toggle between different tools and enhancing user efficiency.

With a compact team of just two employees, Laserfocus is agile and responsive, ready to adapt to the evolving needs of its clients. They prioritize a clean user experience, eliminating duplicate fields and ambiguous data, which enables reliable decision-making. This approach has led to clients reporting significant productivity boosts—one user noted a 25% increase in calls and deals after implementing Laserfocus.  

Moreover, Laserfocus employs a unique precache technology that ensures Salesforce data remains secure and accessible, without the need for storing it externally. This grants their customers enhanced security, including compliance with GDPR and CCPA regulations.

Laserfocus markets itself towards various roles within sales organizations, including account executives, sales operations, and customer success teams. Each of these roles benefits from personalized solutions designed to streamline workflows and improve productivity.

For those interested in experimenting with the platform, Laserfocus offers a free trial without requiring a credit card. 

Visit their website, [Laserfocus](https://www.laserfocus.io/), to learn more and see how they can simplify your sales processes. It's a straightforward solution aiming to enhance productivity while maintaining data integrity—just the kind of balance that successful teams need today.
